Package org.tair.sql.expression

Interface Summary
IAliasedExpression An aliased expression is an expression that has a SQL alias (AS clause).
IExpression An interface defining the operations available for any SQL expression
IMultipleParameterExpression An interface for SQL expressions that contain multiple bind parameters; these will usually be WHERE clause expressions
IScalarExpression<T> A scalar expression results in a value of type T on execution of the SQL statement.
ISelectExpression<T> An aliased, scalar expression that appears in a SELECT list of expressions; if nothing is constructed, the expression will be the NULL keyword.
ISingleParameterExpression<P> A SQL expression suitable for use in a SELECT list or as a value expression in a WHERE clause, GROUP BY clause, or ORDER BY clause; the expression may include a single parameter or may be just a parameter itself; the expression always evaluates to a single value of type P
ISubqueryExpression An interface for a SQL expression that is a subquery of some kind
 

Class Summary
AbstractMultipleParameterExpression An abstract implementation of the IMultipleParameterExpression interface and a subclass of the Expression class that implements the value binding mechanism.
AbstractSingleParameterExpression<P> An abstract implementation of the basic methods of the single parameter expression interface, which is suitable for expressions in a WHERE or FROM clause that have a single parameter, or for expressions that constitute a parameter by itself (expression "?", in other words).
AliasedExpression An expression that has an alias; aliases appear in expressions in a SELECT list
BigDecimalExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of Expression that implements the value as a BigDecimal
BigDecimalParameterExpression A single-parameter expression with a BigDecimal parameter.
BigDecimalSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
BigIntegerExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of AliasedExpression that implements the value as a BigInteger
BigIntegerParameterExpression A single-parameter expression with a BigInteger parameter
BigIntegerSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
BooleanExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of Expression that implements the value as a Boolean
BooleanParameterExpression A single-parameter expression with a Boolean parameter.
BooleanSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
Expression A SQL expression suitable for use in a SELECT list or as a value expression in a WHERE clause, GROUP BY clause, or ORDER BY clause.
IntegerExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of Expression that implements the value as an Integer
IntegerParameterExpression A single-parameter expression with an Integer parameter
IntegerSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
ParameterizedSubqueryExpression An abstract subquery expression that has one or more parameters (JDBC ? expressions) in the query, usually in the WHERE clause; subclass this class and override the bind() method with the appropriate JDBC binding code.
ScalarSubqueryExpression<V> A scalar subquery expression that returns a value of a specified type
StringExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of Expression that implements the value as a String
StringParameterExpression A SQL expression with a single String parameter
StringSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
SubqueryExpression An implementation of the ISubqueryExpression interface and a concrete subclass of the Expression class that represents a SQL expression that is a subquery.
TimestampExpression A concrete instantiation and subclass of Expression that implements the value as a BigDecimal
TimestampParameterExpression A single-parameter expression with a Timestamp (date) parameter
TimestampSubqueryExpression A scalar subquery expression that returns a String value
Utilities  
Value<V> A parameter value of type V; used in multiple-parameter expression value lists
 

Enum Summary
BooleanParameterExpression.Type Enumerated type specifying the kind of persistent value stored in the database.
 

Exception Summary
NoSuchLexicalVariableException A checked exception that indicates that there is no such lexical variable as one that a client has requested.
UnsupportedJdbcDataTypeException Specific exception for situation where the client supplies a Java object of a type that the Expression system does not support.
